participant_1.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
i wear a lot of purple.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
I want to look my best, so I try to take care of my appearance.

participant_2.background:
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm not lonely because of my friends.
I loved spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
I value my education.
I always end my day with a cup of chai tea to wind down from the chaos of family life.
I'm doing well at school, but I wish I was taller so I could reach the top shelf.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, go hiking in the mountains, and read. What about you?
I like to play football, watch movies, and spend time with my family and friends too. I'm also really passionate about the ocean, and I'm working hard to make a positive impact on it.
That's awesome! What do you do to help the ocean?
I volunteer for a local environmental group that works to clean up beaches and waterways. I also try to reduce my own environmental impact by recycling and composting.
That's great! I try to do the same things. I also love to go swimming in the ocean, but I'm always careful not to pollute it.
Me too! The ocean is such a beautiful place, and it's important to protect it.
I agree! So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go hiking with my friends or watch a movie. What are you doing?
I'm not sure either. I might go to the mountains with my family, or I might just stay home and relax.
Sounds like both of us have a lot of fun options!
